text: Sea Scouts is an animated cartoon short film in the Donald Duck series. ==Voice cast== * Clarence Nash as Donald Duck, Huey, Dewey and Louie ==Home media== The short was released on May 18, 2004 on Walt Disney Treasures: The Chronological Donald, Volume One: 1934-1941. ==References== == Other websites == * * * Category:Donald Duck
title: Sea Scouts (movie)
